/* BoardMapper.xml , getBoardList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BOARD_ID, A.POST_NO, A.POST_GRP_NO, A.POST_GRP_SN, A.POST_LVL, A.CATE_ID, A.POST_TIT, A.POST_CONT, A.POST_SD, A.POST_ED, A.REG_ID, A.REG_NM, A.REG_EMAIL, A.MOD_ID, A.MOD_NM, A.MOD_EMAIL, NVL(A.VIEW_CNT, 0) AS VIEW_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CM_FILE_MST WHERE FILE_GRP_SEQ = A.FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS ATTFILE_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CM_BOARD_COMT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND POST_NO = A.POST_NO) AS COMNT_CNT, A.NOTI_YN, A.MAIN_NOTI_YN, A.FILE_GRP_SEQ, A.DEL_YN, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, A.SECRT_YN, CASE WHEN T.PRD_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN NVL(A.POST_SD, '00000000') AND NVL(A.POST_ED, '99999999') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ELSE 'N' END AS SHOW_YN, #{paramsMap.search_type} as yy, #{paramsMap.search_comment} as xx FROM CM_BOARD A JOIN CM_BOARD_MGT T ON T.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID LEFT JOIN CM_BOARD_MGR R ON R.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID AND R.USER_ID = 'SYSTEM' WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BOARD_ID = '1' AND CASE WHEN NVL(T.PRD_USE_YN,'') != 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN NVL(R.USER_ID,'') != '' THEN 'Y' WHEN T.PRD_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(A.POST_SD,'00000000') BETWEEN NVL(A.POST_SD,'00000000') AND NVL(A.POST_ED,'99999999') THEN 'Y' END ELSE 'N' END = 'Y' ) M WHERE 1=1
AND (POST_TIT like concat('%',#{paramsMap.search_comment},'%') OR POST_CONT like concat('%',#{paramsMap.search_comment},'%'))
AND POST_TIT like concat('%',#{paramsMap.search_comment},'%')
AND POST_CONT like concat('%',#{paramsMap.search_comment},'%')
ORDER BY CAST(POST_GRP_NO AS INTEGER) DESC, CAST(POST_GRP_SN AS INTEGER)
mapper.insert: /* BoardMapper.xml , insertBoard */ INSERT INTO CM_BOARD ( BOARD_ID, POST_NO, POST_GRP_NO, POST_GRP_SN, POST_LVL, POST_TIT, POST_CONT, POST_SD, POST_ED, REG_NM, REG_EMAIL, MOD_NM, MOD_EMAIL, NOTI_YN, MAIN_NOTI_YN, DEL_YN, SECRT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_DT) VALUES (#{paramsMap.board_id}, #{paramsMap.post_no}, NVL(#{paramsMap.post_grp_no}, #{paramsMap.post_no}), NVL(#{paramsMap.post_grp_sn}, 0), NVL(#{paramsMap.post_lvl} , 1), #{paramsMap.post_tit}, #{paramsMap.post_cont, jdbcType=CLOB}, REPLACE(#{paramsMap.post_sd}, '-', ''), REPLACE(#{paramsMap.post_ed}, '-', ''), #{paramsMap.reg_nm}, #{paramsMap.reg_email}, #{paramsMap.mod_nm}, #{paramsMap.mod_email}, IF(#{paramsMap.noti_yn} = 'TRUE', 'Y', 'N'), NVL(#{paramsMap.main_noti_yn}, 'N'), 'N', NVL(#{paramsMap.secrt_yn}, 'N'), (SELECT ID FROM SYS_USER WHERE USERNAME = #{paramsMap.reg_id}), now(), (SELECT ID FROM SYS_USER WHERE USERNAME = #{paramsMap.mod_id}), now() )
mapper.update: /* BoardMapper.xml , updateBoard */ UPDATE CM_BOARD SET POST_GRP_NO = #{paramsMap.post_grp_no}, POST_GRP_SN = #{paramsMap.post_grp_sn}, POST_LVL = #{paramsMap.post_lvl}, POST_TIT = #{paramsMap.post_tit}, POST_CONT = #{paramsMap.post_cont}, POST_SD = REPLACE(#{paramsMap.post_sd}, '-', ''), POST_ED = REPLACE(#{paramsMap.post_ed}, '-', ''), MOD_NM = #{paramsMap.mod_nm}, MOD_EMAIL = #{paramsMap.mod_email}, NOTI_YN = IF(#{paramsMap.noti_yn} = 'TRUE', 'Y', 'N'), MAIN_NOTI_YN = NVL(#{paramsMap.main_noti_yn}, 'N'), FILE_GRP_SEQ = #{paramsMap.file_grp_seq}, mod_id = #{paramsMap.mod_id}, mod_dt = now() where board_id = #{paramsMap.board_id} and post_no = #{paramsMap.post_no}
